# Reports & Data

Generated reports, analytics, and data exports.

## Folders

### analytics/
Analytics reports and dashboards
- User statistics
- Performance metrics
- Usage analytics

### exports/
Data exports and backups
- Database exports
- User data exports
- System backups

## Usage

Reports are generated automatically by various tools and scripts.

See: `../tools/` for scripts that generate reports.

---

**Note**: This folder is for generated files only. Do not commit large files to git.
